remarks: A homomorphism of monoids preserves group multiples.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
statement:
ghmmulg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ghmmulg.s $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
ghmmulg.t $e |- .X. = ( .g ` H ) $.
ghmmulg $p |- ( ( F e. ( G GrpHom H ) /\ N e. ZZ /\ X e. B ) -> ( F ` ( N .x. X ) ) = ( N .X. ( F ` X ) ) ) $.
